title: Rest Country Api
description: Integrating with the REST Countries API to pull country data and display it. Filtering country based on user input, using react router to get more details of a specific country from the Api.

title: DazCravings
description: A cake E-commerce site, user can add to cart, remove from cart, get more details about a cake item, view all products available and have a seamless user experience

title: Dictionary web app
description: A Dictionary web application, user can search for a word, listen to the pronunciation of that word and change font

title: url link shortener
description: Integrating with  shortcode URL shortening API , user is able to paste in a link and get it shortened, even when the user leaves the browser the previous links are retained, user is also able to copy link to clipboard.

title: Static Job Listings
description: user is able to filter out jobs based on selected categories.
